body:
Day 20 - 461*
The art was less than decent, with their big eyes, and the story about the love potion generic. Not really a fan of the small Yuri either so...
4/10.
Also, it appears that I am once again in the front line. From the back those around me motivated me to keep moving on and yet they aren't here anymore with me. The winner is also the loser if there is no one else in the race and smiling after winning is only half as good when alone. I hope that your life's become even better than they already are. Until next time.
Coby, you probably moved on with your life, but if you ever continue, my discord is bulba2020t#1548
